column4: hi guys. I have a problem. I need to get some files from my labtop which is behind a firewall where i work. I can make an ssh connection to the server at work and from there another to my labtop, but i can't figure out how to copy files all the way through both connections. Does anyone know how?
sftp uses ssh connection, you just need to enable the sftp module in your ssh server. it is by default
